column1: The Pit Room////Delicious! We loved the pulled pork
column3: and the smoked chicken tacos. Portions are large and the food comes out quickly
column4: if you come in hungry like we did
column5: it won't be long until you're chowing down. We were there for an early lunch on a chilly
column6: rainy Saturday so we sat inside the main restaurant
column7: but on a nice day the patio would be a great spot.
